name: Tableau Thug
description:
A mobster square is on a quest to take over the city for his gang, and all he needs to do it take out the local police force, take out an enemy mob, and fight some newsies since they want to dominate the news selling industry!

CONTROLS:
arrows to move

Z to jump

X to shoot

Credits-
3zo07ed - Coded the game

Cactus Companion - Made character artwork + Hud Hearts

The Legendary Zoid - Found the royalty free music for us

(sorry about the red level music being too loud and the health bar not showing up in yellow level we ran out of time to fix it.)

have fun! :)
